[[Donald Sutherland]] | narrated = | theme_music_composer = [[Maurice Jarre]] | country = United States | language = English | num_episodes = | producer = Jon Avnet
[[Jordan Kerner]] | editor = Sabrina Plisco | cinematography = [[Denis Lenoir]] | runtime = 151 minutes | company = | distributor = [[NBC]] | budget = | network = | first_aired = November 4, 2001 | last_aired = | preceded_by = | followed_by = | website = }} '''''Uprising''''' is a 2001 [[war movie|war]]/[[drama film|drama]] [[miniseries|television miniseries]] about the [[Warsaw Ghetto Uprising]]. The film was directed by [[Jon Avnet]] and written by Avnet and [[Paul Brickman]]. It was filmed in multiple locations, including [[Bratislava, Slovakia]] and [[Innsbruck]] in [[Tyrol (state)|Tyrol]], [[Austria]]. This miniseries was first aired on the [[NBC]] television network over two consecutive nights during November 2001.{{cite news |url=http://www.tvtango.com/miniseries/uprising |title=Uprising |website=TV Tango |date= |author=}} The miniseries's soundtrack was the last film score composed by [[Maurice Jarre]], and prominently features the work of [[Max Bruch]], including his [[Violin Concerto No. 1 (Bruch)|Violin Concerto No. 1]] during the opening sequence. ==Plot== [[Poland|Polish]] [[Jew]]s imprisoned in the [[Warsaw Ghetto]] [[Warsaw Ghetto Uprising|rise up against]] the [[Nazi Germany|Nazi German]] army in 1943. ==Cast== * [[Leelee Sobieski]] as [[Tosia Altman]] * [[Hank Azaria]] as [[Mordechai Anielewicz]] * [[David Schwimmer]] as [[Icchak Cukierman|Yitzhak "Antek" Zuckerman]] * [[Jon Voight]] as Maj. [[Friedrich Krüger]] * [[Cary Elwes]] as Dr. [[Fritz Hippler]] * Palle Granditsky as Dr. [[Janusz Korczak]] * Hannah Hetzer as Girl in Trench ==Alternate titles== The [[French language|French]] title for the film is ''1943, l'ultime révolte.''[http://www.amazon.fr/dp/B00007CW2V 1943, l'ultime révolte: Amazon.fr: Cary Elwes, David Schwimmer, Donald Sutherland, Hank Azaria, Jon Voight, Leelee Sobieski, Jon Avnet: DVD] The [[German language|German]] title for the film is ''Uprising: Der Aufstand.''[http://www.amazon.de/dp/B00006JL5V Uprising - Der Aufstand - Mini TV-Serie: Amazon.de: LeeLee Sobieski, Hank Azaria, David Schwimmer, Jon Avnet: DVD & Blu-ray] ==See also== *''[[Mila 18]]'' * [[List of Holocaust films]] * [[Vladka Meed]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{IMDb title|id=0250798|title=Uprising}} {{Jon Avnet}} [[Category:2001 television films]] [[Category:American television films]] [[Category:American films]] [[Category:Holocaust films]] [[Category:Warsaw Ghetto Uprising]] [[Category:Films shot in Slovakia]] [[Category:Films directed by Jon Avnet]] [[Category:Film scores by Maurice Jarre]] {{US-tv-film-stub}}
